src:
Ultimatum Arsenal pada Unai Emery: 4 Pertandingan Lagi!
05 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery dikabarkan punya kesempatan empat pertandingan lagi untuk membuktikan kualitasnya pada dewan pengurus Arsenal. Emery tidak bisa bersantai-santai, waktu tak lagi berada di pihaknya.
Emery berada dalam tekanan dalam beberapa pekan terakhir setelah Arsenal hanya bisa memetik tiga kemenangan pada sembilan pertandingan terakhir di semua kompetisi. Teranyar, hasil imbang 1-1 kontra Wolverhampton akhir pekan lalu dianggap mengecewakan.
Situasi ini menyulut spekulasi tentang masa depan Emery. Nama Jose Mourinho terus disebut sebagai calon pengganti, meski pihak klub sudah tegas membantahnya.
Biar begitu bukan berarti tekanan di pundak Emery jadi lebih ringan. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Arsenal's Ultimatum at Unai Emery: 4 matches to go!
05 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Unai Emery is said to have a chance at four more matches to prove his quality on the Arsenal board. Emery can't relax, time is no longer on his side.
Emery has been under pressure in recent weeks after Arsenal could only pick three wins in the last nine matches in all competitions. Latest, a 1-1 draw against Wolverhampton last weekend was considered disappointing.
This situation sparked speculation about Emery's future. Jose Mourinho's name continues to be referred to as a potential successor, even though the club has firmly denied it.
So that doesn't mean the pressure on Emery's shoulders is lighter. Read below, Bolaneters!
